Figure 8:Annual average profiles of the major Al-containing species, simulated by WACCM-Al
at 54N between 2004-2014
Al+,AlO+,AlOH+,Other ionic Al,AlO,AlOH,AlO2H2, Other Neutral Al
Note:Other ionic Al is the total of(AlN2+,AlCO2+,AlH2O+,OAlO+)
Other Neutral Al is the total of (OAlO,OAlO2,AlCO3,OAlOH,Al2O3H3,Al2O2H2,Al2O3H,Al2O2H,Al2CO4H,Al2OH)
Altitude(km), Al+,AlO+,AlOH+,Other ionic Al,AlO,AlOH,AlO2H2, Other Neutral Al (cm-3)
